categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Suutrar was a male Zabrak Jedi Master of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Rishi, he was part of Satele Shan's force that traveled to Yavin 4 and established the anti-Revanite coalition along with Imperial forces under Darth Marr.
Master Suutrar appears as a Jedi Knight trainer in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
